A great game. It shows what happens when you strip the graphics of a game, and just have pure gameplay. Shooting against the military feels better tan most games today. The boss fights and mechanics are great. Would recommend.
It's good, with a few exceptions.  It had some bad platforming and minor bugs, but overall, I liked it.

Muy buena historia y jugabilidad, perfecto para personas que le gusta las buenas historias en un videojuego.
Haven't even finished it yet and is already my favourite game

Game is very dated, but as a player just getting into gaming and the half life series, I was still able to appreciate it for what its significance may have been at the time. Cool story, HD models were better, and overall a very well thought out game. Completed in 23 hours on Easy Mode. Most of my difficulties were with the physics of jumping/landing, ladders, and getting killed by fans/turbines that I was seemingly well clear of. Only a couple bad glitches that forced me to revert to a previous save point to resolve. Excited to play Blue Shift, Opposing Force, then HL2. Still enjoyed the Portal games way more, but I'm not a FPS person, and my opinion might change after playing the sequels.

One of the best game of all time. I used to play this game on my phone and i was just amazed. The game was just amazing, the game was very story driven, the game was very epic and overall i was having fun playing the crazy game, and the guy in the hazard suit from the game. The game is good and sometimes fun but its gets annoying since people will disagree the game with their stupid suggestions (lol i dont remember the people) and the game requires a lot of playing so you can see the game you've never seen before like this. Luckily the game provides you with good time. The game is a lot of fun to discuss with friends. 8.5/10

Holds up surprisingly well to this day, mostly due to superb level design. The environments and the way how the game makes the players interact with them to problem solve their way through is mostly pretty creative, the shooting hasn't aged well compared to other classic games like Quake 1 and 2 but overall Half Life still stands as a testament to good old school FPS design.

La pieza maestra de VALVE que lo posesi√≥no en una gran compania de videojuegos de PC.
Half Life tiene historia,  es el precursor de muchos juegos que salieron posteriormente.
El juego para su tiempo era muy revolucionario especialmente con la configuraci√≥n de teclado y motor grafico. 
Tiene una interesante ambientaci√≥n y desenlace.
Tiene un modo multijugador que en estas fechas a√∫n tienes para jugar con pocos jugadores y bots.
Si te interesa la nostalgia de los juegos de los a√±os 90 en PC, definitivamente debes tener Half life en tu biblioteca.

Ya veo por qu√© es el m√°s clasico de los clasicos. Para la √©poca y la actualidad es un juegazo. Me hace acordar mucho al doom pero anda por ah√≠. Al fin me pude pasar el juego luego de varios a√±os. Estamos en octubre de 2020 y me lo pas√© luego de cuando. 4 a√±os? Si. Mu gust√≥ mucho la banda sonora, combina a la perfecci√≥n con el ambiente. Los bichos son de habilidades tan variadas que hay veces que ten√©s que morir para conoces a la perfecci√≥n todas sus habilidades y patrones de movimientos. Si sos mas avilidoso no hace falta eso. Las cargas, a ver, para ser un juego viejo tiene pantallas de carga, sabiendo que antes los juegos no ten√≠an carga... En lo personal arruina un poco la fluidez con la que se juega pero la tension del ambiente logra mantenerse. Me encantan las armas, me encantan los monstruos, me encanta el balanceo de da√±o, me encanta los puntos de recarga y vida, me encantan las municiones, me encanta el juego.
Oyun bilindiƒüi gibi, herhangi bir ≈üey demeye gerek yok. Ancak oyunun daha aktif oynanmasƒ± isteniyorsa resmi sunucular a√ßƒ±p genel rank sistemi koyulabilir.

Eles tamb√©m possuem lan√ßa- 
 -granadas, esses proj√©teis s√£o muito r√°pidos e letais e os inimigos quando te v√™em reagem muito r√°pido para lan√ß√°-los na sua dire√ß√£o. Joguei na maior dificuldade e est√° sendo uma experi√™ncia agrad√°vel, mas sofr√≠vel ao mesmo tempo.

As escadas s√£o bem chatas, n√£o possuindo um bot√£o de a√ß√£o para essa situa√ß√£o, voc√™ acaba ficando em d√∫vida com forma correta de descer. No decorrer do jogo h√° um tipo de "trampolim" que parece uma pereba e acaba sendo chato, na primeira vez, descobrir como aquilo funciona, tem situa√ß√µes em que voc√™ vai ser perseguido e vai precisar n√£o cometer deslizes, ou ent√£o √© game over.
Como mencionei antes, sobre o inimigo saber sua localiza√ß√£o, tem um maldito helic√≥ptero que sabe onde voc√™ est√°, mesmo voc√™ entrando em t√∫neis e tudo mais, parece que a HEV Suit de Gordon ter um dispositivo de localiza√ß√£o foi s√≥ uma desculpa, esse jogo n√£o tem furtividade, nem mesmo headshots funcionam.
Outro fator que me deixou decepcionado foi a m√∫sica n√£o durar muito, h√° partes em que a m√∫sica gera uma certa adrenalina, a m√∫sica do jogo √© excelente, uma pena n√£o durar muito, eu salvo o jogo em partes que toca uma m√∫sica legal, como a quando voc√™ pega a Tau Gun e a quando voc√™ sai de um cano que liga a um penhasco e passa um ca√ßa e toca o tema da Valve.

I thought people were exaggerating when they complained about the final chapter of the game, but no, it really is significantly worse than the rest of the game. Overall the game is great. It's dated of course, there's some cheap deaths and some frustrating moments, but overall it holds up well. The game feels quite modern in terms of level design, it doesn't just expect you to look everywhere with no clues, but usually has NPCs tell you what to do, so if you listen it's pretty clear.

Overall I would recommend, just be prepared for Xen.
Good game, graphics are farily good and fun gameplay. The only issue is the glitches but theyr'e in frequent.
